column4: I am running server 12.04 in VM and for some reason it's not bringing up the 2nd nic automaticly what do I do wrong?
please post a screenshot of virtualbox's network config page, as well as a pastebin of "ifconfig" from the guest machine
it's vmware if that's the same for you
ok, post a screenshot/whatever of vmware's virtual network adapter page/output/whatever
